name: (Beta) Mochi:Online
description:
OH NO! Mochi's Trapped on Nexus! Now He's gotta go through, searching for rocket parts. however, on nexus, Evil Comes out of nowhere and fun is rampant in the most spectacular Experience From JohnSilver, now playable on your browser.

WARNING: Performance is guaranteed to be worse than the desktop version, and this version receives updates less frequently. Please play the desktop version for the Definitive Way to play Mochi's Adventure!
